Our Features

Discover the powerful suite of tools Trace'N Find provides to keep your devices, data, and peace of mind secure.

Complete Protection

A Feature for Every Need

Real-Time Tracking

Pinpoint your device's exact location on a live map using GPS, Wi-Fi, and cellular data for unmatched accuracy.

Remote Security Suite

Instantly lock your device, play a loud alarm to find it nearby, or completely wipe all sensitive data if it's lost for good.

Geofencing & Smart Alerts

Create virtual "safe zones" (like home or work) and get instant alerts the moment your device enters or leaves them.

Location History

Review a detailed timeline of your device's past locations, complete with timestamps and a breadcrumb trail on the map.

Data Backup & Restore

Securely back up your important contacts, photos, and files to the cloud. Restore them to a new device with one click.

Multi-Factor Authentication

Protect your Trace'N Find account from unauthorized access with an extra layer of security via SMS or authenticator app.

Pinpoint Accuracy

See Your Devices in Real-Time

Our advanced tracking system provides a live, interactive map view of all your registered devices. Whether your device is across the street or across the country, you'll see its location update in seconds.

  • Hybrid Tracking

    Uses GPS, Wi-Fi triangulation, and cellular data for accuracy indoors and out.

  • Clustered View

    Our maps are "performant" and "scalable," grouping nearby devices so your view is never cluttered.

Total Control

Your Remote Security Suite

When your device is missing, every second counts. Our "backend-friendly" command system lets you take immediate action from your web dashboard.

  • Remote Lock

    Instantly lock your device with a custom passcode to prevent access.

  • Data Wipe

    Protect your privacy by remotely erasing all personal data from your device.

Ready to Secure Your Devices?

Join thousands of users who trust Trace'N Find to protect their devices. Get started for free, no credit card required.

Get Started for Free
